# Caf DevHub

## Home





## Product guides

- [Overview](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/readme)
- [User Onboarding](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/our-solutions/user-onboarding)
- [ID Document Verification](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/our-solutions/id-document-verification)
- [Know Your Customer - KYC](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/our-solutions/kyc)
- [Know Your Business - KYB](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/our-solutions/kyb)
- [Account Takeover Prevention](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/our-solutions/smart-auth)
- [Trust Platform](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform)
- [New Query](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/new-query)
- [Executions](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/executions)
- [Company](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/company)
- [Onboarding List](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/onboarding-list)
- [Onboarding Builder](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/onboarding-builder)
- [Query Templates](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/query-templates)
- [Workflow Builder](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/trust-platform/workflow-builder)
- [Smart Auth (identity)](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/smart-auth): On this page, you will find information about the Smart Auth SDK.
- [Getting Started](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/smart-auth/getting-started)
- [Access Token](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/smart-auth/access-token)
- [Checking the Response](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/user-guide/smart-auth/checking-the-response)
- [Onboarding Journey](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboarding-journey)
- [Company Search through API](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/company-search-through-api)
- [Onboarding links into WebView and iFrame](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration)
- [WebView](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/webview): This document provides guidelines for configuring WebView to ensure proper functionality of web Onboarding integrations.
- [Android](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/webview/webview_android): This document provides instructions to create a WebView into an Android project.
- [iOS](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/webview/webview_ios): This document provides instructions to create a WebView into an iOS project.
- [React Native](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/webview/webview_react_native): This document provides instructions to create a WebView using React Native.
- [Flutter](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/webview/webview_flutter): This document provides instructions to create a WebView using Flutter.
- [iFrame](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/iframe): This document provides instructions for integrating the Onboarding process into an iFrame.
- [Events](https://docs.caf.io/caf-docs/quick-start-guides/onboardings-integration/events): This document explains how to handle events emitted by the onboarding process using window.postMessage().

## API

- [Overview](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/readme): Welcome to the API documentation! On this page, you will find everything you need to know to improve the security and quality of your apps using our API.
- [Authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/authentication)
- [Available resources](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources)
- [Transaction](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources/transaction)
- [Onboarding](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources/onboarding)
- [Profile](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources/profile)
- [Synchronous services](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources/synchronous-services)
- [OCR Sync](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources/synchronous-services/ocr-sync)
- [Basic Data Sync (Individual)](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/available-resources/synchronous-services/pf-basic-data-sync)
- [Transaction details](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details)
- [Services](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services)
- [Document OCR](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/document-ocr)
- [Documentscopy](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/documentscopy)
- [Face Liveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/face-liveness)
- [Facematch](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/facematch)
- [Facial Biometrics](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/facial-biometrics)
- [Private Faceset](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/private-faceset)
- [Shared Faceset](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/shared-faceset)
- [Document Liveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/services/document-liveness)
- [Background check](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check)
- [Data structure](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/data-structure)
- [KYC](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc)
- [Driver](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc/driver)
- [Financial](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc/financial)
- [Labor](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc/labor)
- [Register data](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc/register-data)
- [Relationships](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc/relationships)
- [Risk](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyc/risk)
- [KYB](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyb)
- [Financial](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyb/financial)
- [Labor](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyb/labor)
- [Register data](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyb/register-data)
- [Risk](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/kyb/risk)
- [Vehicle](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/vehicle)
- [Register data](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/background-check/vehicle/register-data)
- [Validation rules](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/validation-rules)
- [Manual reprovals](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/transaction-details/manual-reprovals)
- [Webhooks](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/webhooks)
- [Transaction](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/webhooks/transaction): Transaction webhooks are used to communicate transaction status updates to the client-server.
- [Profile](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/webhooks/profile): Profile webhooks are used to communicate profile status updates to the client-server.
- [Face authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/core-api/webhooks/face-authentication): Face authentication webhooks are used to communicate authentication to the client-server.
- [Authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/mobile-api/authentication): Authenticate the Mobile API with your access key to use the available resources.
- [Available resources](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/mobile-api/available-resources)
- [Face liveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/mobile-api/available-resources/face-liveness)
- [Face registration](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/mobile-api/available-resources/face-registration)
- [Face authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/mobile-api/available-resources/face-authentication)
- [Response signature](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/mobile-api/response-signature)
- [Available resources](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources)
- [Services](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/services)
- [Company search](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/services/company-search)
- [Company record](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/services/company-record)
- [Basic Data Sync (Individual)](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/services/cpf-sync)
- [Sanctions](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/services/sanctions)
- [Orchestrations](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations)
- [Transactions](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions)
- [Services](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services)
- [KYB](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyb)
- [Credit Report](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyb/credit-report)
- [Business Identity](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyb/business-identity)
- [KYC](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc)
- [Adverse Media](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc/adversemedia)
- [PEPs](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc/peps)
- [Sanctions](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc/sanctions)
- [Warnings](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc/warnings)
- [Global identity verification](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc/gdc)
- [Global identity double verification](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/orchestrations/transactions/services/kyc/gdc2x2)
- [Onboardings](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/onboardings)
- [Links](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/available-resources/onboardings/links)
- [Webhooks](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/global-api/webhooks)
- [Authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/smart-auth-api/authentication)

- [Authentications](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/smart-auth-api/available-resources/authentications)

- [Authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/joint-resolution-6-api/authentication)
- [Available resources](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/joint-resolution-6-api/available-resources)
- [Suspected fraud creation](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/joint-resolution-6-api/available-resources/suspected-fraud-creation)
- [Suspected fraud query](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/joint-resolution-6-api/available-resources/suspected-fraud-query)
- [Suspected fraud update](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/joint-resolution-6-api/available-resources/suspected-fraud-update)
- [Suspected fraud deletion](https://docs.caf.io/caf-api/joint-resolution-6-api/available-resources/suspected-fraud-deletion)

## SDKs

- [Overview](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/readme)
- [First steps](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/sdk_integration_documentation)
- [Getting Started with the SDK](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/getting-started-with-the-sdk)
- [Standalone Modules](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules)
- [CafFaceLiveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness): Enables you to integrate live facial verification and fingerprint authentication technology into your Android applications, offering a seamless and secure way to authenticate users.
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/release-notes)
- [Current Version](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/current-version)
- [Requirements](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/requirements)
- [Gradle Dependencies](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/gradle)
- [Gradle Source Code](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/gradle-code)
- [SDK Lifecycle](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/lifecycle)
- [Building the SDK](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/builder)
- [Start Liveness Verification](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/start-sdk)
- [Source Code](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/source-code)
- [References](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/references)
- [Advanced Features](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/advanced_features)
- [FAQ](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/faq_caf_face_liveness_sdk)
- [CafSmartAuth](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth): Enables you to integrate live facial verification and fingerprint authentication technology into your Android applications, offering a seamless and secure way to authenticate users.
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/release-notes)
- [Current Version](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/current-version)
- [Requirements](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/requirements)
- [Gradle Dependencies](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/gradle)
- [Gradle Source Code](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/gradle-code)
- [Permissions](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/permissions)
- [SDK Lifecycle](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/lifecycle)
- [Building the SDK](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/builder)
- [Start Smart Authentication](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/start-sdk)
- [Source Code](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/source-code)
- [References](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/references)
- [FAQ](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/cafsmartauth/faq)
- [DocumentDetector](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector): Capture authentic, high-quality photos of user-submitted documents, allowing you to send them later for analysis in our API.
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/release-notes)
- [Current Version](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/current-version)
- [Requirements](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/requirements)
- [Gradle Dependencies](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/gradle)
- [Gradle Source Code](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/gradle-code)
- [Setting up the SDK](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder)
- [Setting properties](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/methods)
- [Capture Stages](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/capture_stage)
- [Messages Settings](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/messages)
- [Customization](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/customization): Learn how to customize our SDK and make it look like your app.
- [Security Settings](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/security)
- [Detection Steps](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/steps)
- [Upload Mode](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/upload)
- [Advanced Settings](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/advanced-settings): This page presents the default settings that can be made in all SDKs.
- [Proxy configuration](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/advanced-settings/proxy-settings)
- [Preview configuration](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/advanced-settings/preview-settings): This page explains the possible settings for displaying the capture preview screen.
- [Start Document Detection](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/start-sdk)
- [Source Code](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/source-code)
- [Google security form](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/google-security-form)
- [Reduce SDKs size](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/reduce-sdks-size): This page presents some elements that will reduce the size of the SDKs.
- [SDKs response](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/sdks-response)
- [References](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/references)
- [FAQ](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/document-detector/faq)
- [FaceLiveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/faceliveness): Enables you to integrate live facial verification and fingerprint authentication technology into your Android applications, offering a seamless and secure way to authenticate users.
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/faceliveness/release-notes)
- [FaceAuthenticator](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/faceauthenticator): Enables you to integrate live facial authentication and fingerprint technology into your Android applications, offering a seamless and secure way to authenticate users.
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/android/standalone-modules/faceauthenticator/release-notes)
- [Getting Started with the SDK](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/getting-started-with-the-sdk)
- [Standalone Modules](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules)
- [CafFaceLiveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness): Enables you to integrate live facial verification and fingerprint authentication technology into your iOS applications, offering a seamless and secure way to authenticate users.
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/release-notes)
- [Installation](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/installation)
- [Current Version](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/current-version)
- [Requirements](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/requirements)
- [SDK Lifecycle](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/lifecycle)
- [Building the SDK](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/builder)
- [Start Liveness Verification](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/caffaceliveness/start-sdk)

- [DocumentDetector](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector)
- [Release Notes](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/release-notes)

- [Upload Mode](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/upload)
- [Advanced Settings](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/advanced-settings): This page presents the default settings that can be made in all SDKs.
- [Proxy configuration](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/advanced-settings/proxy-settings)
- [Preview configuration](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/builder/advanced-settings/preview-settings): This page explains the possible settings for displaying the capture preview screen.
- [Start Document Detection](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/start-sdk)
- [References](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/references)
- [FAQ](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/document-detector/faq)
- [FaceLiveness](https://docs.caf.io/caf-sdk/ios/standalone-modules/faceliveness): FaceLiveness for iOS brings cutting-edge live facial verification and fingerprint authentication technology into your iOS applications. By leveraging the iProov Biometrics iOS SDK and FingerprintPro S
